<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Indirect call promotion pass will fall back to function-based comparison if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vtable-count / function-count is smaller than this threshold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118" lineLink="#a3d6e696fa0ea853817352c851be64980"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;float&gt;</a> <a href="#a3d6e696fa0ea853817352c851be64980">ICPVTablePercentageThreshold</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;icp-vtable-percentage-threshold&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(0.995), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;The percentage threshold of vtable-count / function-count for &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;cost-benefit analysis.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Although comparing vtables can save a vtable load, we may need to compare</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vtable pointer with multiple vtable address points due to class inheritance.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Comparing with multiple vtables inserts additional instructions on hot code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// path, and doing so for an earlier candidate delays the comparisons for later</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// candidates. For the last candidate, only the fallback path is affected.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We allow multiple vtable comparison for the last function candidate and use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the option below to cap the number of vtables.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130" lineLink="#af8aa9bfbcecf8fb243beb0e6785156de"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;int&gt;</a> <a href="#af8aa9bfbcecf8fb243beb0e6785156de">ICPMaxNumVTableLastCandidate</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;icp-max-num-vtable-last-candidate&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(1), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;The maximum number of vtable for the last candidate.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134" lineLink="#ac630d7644262e9a92469cce4e67d72ed"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/list">cl::list&lt;std::string&gt;</a> <a href="#ac630d7644262e9a92469cce4e67d72ed">ICPIgnoredBaseTypes</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;icp-ignored-base-types&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;A list of mangled vtable type info names. Classes specified by the &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;type info names and their derived ones will not be vtable-ICP&#39;ed. &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Useful when the profiled types and actual types in the optimized &quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;names are those string literals used in LLVM type metadata&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;DestBB&#96; is a suitable basic block to sink &#96;Inst&#96; into when &#96;Inst&#96; have users</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and all users are in &#96;DestBB&#96;. The caller guarantees that &#96;Inst-&gt;getParent()&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is the sole predecessor of &#96;DestBB&#96; and &#96;DestBB&#96; is dominated by</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;BB&#39; is used only by assert.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#91;&#91;maybe&#95;unused&#93;&#93; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = Inst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BB != DestBB &amp;&amp; BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a3287172f2d13af086e6d66364e8c6de3">getNumSuccessors</a>() == 2 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">         DestBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a74aa9daea070e2ad3394a3ec58b7316a">getUniquePredecessor</a>() == BB &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Guaranteed by ICP transformation&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">      VTableAddressPointOffsetVal&#91;GV&#93;.try&#95;emplace(AddressPointOffset, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Inserted)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-cskyconstantislandpass-cpp-/#a0bd7d621ba8de56e4052df49da823802">Iter</a>-&gt;second = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-indirectcallpromotion-cpp-/#a2155baa694ee1fb098bf0a5808f00734">getVTableAddressPointOffset</a>(GV, AddressPointOffset);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;IndirectCallPromoter::computeVTableInfos(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &#42;CB, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-indirectcallpromotion-cpp-/#a686d9143a6a437108d460d05ce976621">VTableGUIDCountsMap</a> &amp;GUIDCountsMap,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;PromotionCandidate&gt; &amp;Candidates) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a52b3160ffba3b91072a55caf44f7278b">EnableVTableProfileUse</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Take the following code sequence as an example, here is how the code works</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   @vtable1 = &#123;&#91;n x ptr&#93; &#91;... ptr @func1&#93;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   @vtable2 = &#123;&#91;m x ptr&#93; &#91;... ptr @func2&#93;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %vptr = load ptr, ptr %d, !prof !0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %0 = tail call i1 @llvm.type.test(ptr %vptr, metadata !&quot;vtable1&quot;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   tail call void @llvm.assume(i1 %0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %vfn = getelementptr inbounds ptr, ptr %vptr, i64 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %1 = load ptr, ptr %vfn</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call void %1(ptr %d), !prof !1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   !0 = !&#123;!&quot;VP&quot;, i32 2, i64 100, i64 123, i64 50, i64 456, i64 50&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   !1 = !&#123;!&quot;VP&quot;, i32 0, i64 100, i64 789, i64 50, i64 579, i64 50&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Step 1 Find out the %vptr instruction for indirect call and use its !prof</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to populate &#96;GUIDCountsMap&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Step 2 For each vtable-guid, look up its definition from symtab. LTO can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// make vtable definitions visible across modules.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Step 3 Compute the byte offset of the virtual call, by adding vtable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// address point offset and function&#39;s offset relative to vtable address</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// point. For each function candidate, this step tells us the vtable from</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">    TotalCount -= FuncCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumOfPGOICallPromotion++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumPromoted++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a52b3160ffba3b91072a55caf44f7278b">EnableVTableProfileUse</a> || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.VTableGUIDAndCounts.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// After a virtual call candidate gets promoted, update the vtable&#39;s counts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// proportionally. Each vtable-guid in &#96;C.VTableGUIDAndCounts&#96; represents</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a vtable from which the virtual call is loaded. Compute the sum and use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 128-bit APInt to improve accuracy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t SumVTableCount = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#91;GUID, VTableCount&#93; : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.VTableGUIDAndCounts)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SumVTableCount += VTableCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#91;GUID, VTableCount&#93; : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.VTableGUIDAndCounts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> APFuncCount((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)128, FuncCount, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;signed&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">      APFuncCount &#42;= VTableCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">      VTableGUIDCounts&#91;GUID&#93; -= APFuncCount.udiv(SumVTableCount).getZExtValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumPromoted == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NumPromoted &lt;= ICallProfDataRef.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Number of promoted functions should not be greater than the number &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;of values in profile metadata&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update value profiles on the indirect call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">  updateFuncValueProfiles(CB, ICallProfDataRef.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#aebf6ca7590d4f766b894044015a0fa31">slice</a>(NumPromoted), TotalCount,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          NumCandidates);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">  updateVPtrValueProfiles(VPtr, VTableGUIDCounts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;MaxNumVTable&#39; limits the number of vtables to make vtable comparison</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// profitable. Comparing multiple vtables for one function candidate will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// insert additional instructions on the hot path, and allowing more than</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// one vtable for non last candidates may or may not elongate the dependency</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// chain for the subsequent candidates. Set its value to 1 for non-last</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// candidate and allow option to override it for the last candidate.</span></CodeLine>
